text: Immortal Beloved is a 1994 drama movie in which Gary Oldman and Isabella Rossellini star. The movie is about Ludwig van Beethoven. This movie was released in December 1994 in United States theaters. It received mixed reviews. It debuted strongly at the box office. Category:1994 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:English- language movies Category:Movies about composers Category:Movies about classical music and musicians
title: Immortal Beloved
